title: I'm thrilled to see the laggy client issue is back.
body:
God, I missed experiencing the client drop to 3FPS after being open for an hour+. I enjoy it taking a full minute to change runes.

Add this onto the:

- messages not appearing in the right order in champion select
- messages not appearing at all
- not seeing when people join champion select
- not seeing when people have joined/left in the post-game lobby
- chat messages vanishing and reappearing
- not being able to accept games
- not being able to change runes
- friend list not loading right
- popups not working at all
- summoner spells not changing, despite having changed them 20 seconds ago

Blind pick is disgusting right now due to this garbage client. Rofl.
